trans-unit.source: Defines a set of flags that specifies the source or destination context for the stream during serialization.
trans-unit.target: 定義一組旗標，指定序列化期間資料流的來源或目的內容。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates> enum.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContextStates>列舉。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the serialized data can be transmitted to or received from any of the other contexts.
trans-unit.target: 指定序列化的資料可以傳輸到或接收自任何其他內容。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the object graph is being cloned.
trans-unit.target: 指定物件圖形會被複製。

trans-unit.source: Users can assume that the cloned graph will continue to exist within the same process and be safe to access handles or other references to unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以假設複製的圖形將會繼續存在相同的處理序內，且存取控制代碼或其他未受管理資源的參考是安全的。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the source or destination context is a different AppDomain.
trans-unit.target: 指定來源或目的內容為不同的 AppDomain。
(如需 AppDomain 的描述，請參閱[應用程式定義域](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/39e57d07-a740-4cd4-ae82-e119ea3856c1))。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the source or destination context is a different computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定來源或目的內容為不同的電腦。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the source or destination context is a different process on the same computer.
trans-unit.target: 指定來源或目的內容為相同電腦上的不同處理序。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the source or destination context is a file.
trans-unit.target: 指定來源或目的內容為檔案。

trans-unit.source: Users can assume that files will last longer than the process that created them and not serialize objects in such a way that deserialization will require accessing any data from the current process.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以假設檔案將會比建立它們的處理序更持久，並且不會以還原序列化將需要存取來自目前處理序之任何資料的方式序列化物件。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the serialization context is unknown.
trans-unit.target: 指定序列化內容為未知。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the source or destination context is a persisted store, which could include databases, files, or other backing stores.
trans-unit.target: 指定來源或目的內容為持續性存放區，其中可包括資料庫、檔案或其他備份存放區。

trans-unit.source: Users can assume that persisted data will last longer than the process that created the data and not serialize objects so that deserialization will require accessing any data from the current process.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以假設持續性資料將會比建立該資料的處理序更持久，並且不會序列化物件，如此還原序列化將需要存取來自目前處理序的任何資料。

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the data is remoted to a context in an unknown location.
trans-unit.target: 指定資料是在未知的位置中遠端處理至內容。

trans-unit.source: Users cannot make any assumptions whether this is on the same computer.
trans-unit.target: 無論這是否在相同電腦上，使用者無法做出任何假設。
